Initializer# init(top:leading:bottom:trailing:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
init(
    top: CGFloat,
    leading: CGFloat,
    bottom: CGFloat,
    trailing: CGFloat
)
```

### [Creating an edge inset](/documentation/swiftui/edgeinsets/init(top:leading:bottom:trailing:)#Creating-an-edge-inset)

[`init()`](/documentation/swiftui/edgeinsets/init())[`init(_:)`](/documentation/swiftui/edgeinsets/init(_:))Creates a 2D `EdgeInsets` from an `EdgeInsets3D`, dropping its `front` and `back` values.
